title: Freezeing/Lagging No ping or FPS problems, please help
body:
I have been playing league for three years with 60 fps and anywhere from 30-250 ping, and it would always run fine, but as of late (the past few months, after updating my client) I will lag or freeze and dc from the game with my normal ping and fps, I would really like some help as this happens for around 70-80% of my games, and is also the reason i left ranked, I have submitted several (6) tickets on it, and riot is no help, so can I please get some help from the community? I really love league and I would hate to drop it because the damn thing is unplayable.

Also side note, League is the only thing running on my computer, and my computer is the only thing on the internet, hooked up with Ethernet.

replies.body:
If you're fps and ping are showing what you're used to seeing but you're still disconnecting that often, it makes me think this might be more related to packet loss rather than your actual internet speeds. There's a chance that your connection is hitting a rough spot along it's way to our servers which might be what keeps making you lose that connection. 

Check out our [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) with the network logs of some of the games you disconnected in, take a screenshot, and post it here using something like Imgur so I can look over it too.
